ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest Addicts Anonymous] A little trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: give up on freeport way too much trouble however Neriak is looking great now :) you can waste halflings and high elves around the spires and they give you
ygData.messageBody:
give up on freeport
way too much trouble

however Neriak is looking great now :)
you can waste halflings and high elves around the spires
and they give you faction boost in Neriak
you loose faction with the high elves and halflings though
but do you really care what the good softshells think?
:P


--- gamechamp999 <gamechamp999@...> wrote:
> How can a 16 Shaman Iksar get good faction in West
> Freeport? I
> already killed 100 orcs and gave 27 Deathfist Slashed
> Belts to the
> person. How much more do I need to do?
>
